tool.name: Feature selection for metabolomics
tool.description: Metabolomics feature selection with or without bootstrap.
tool.command:
Rscript ${__tool_directory__}/feat_sel.R ## input files --data_file $data_file --meta_file $meta_file
## which meta used for category info --group $group
## feature selection parameters --fs_method $fs_method --top_k $top_k
--boot $boot.boot_selector #if $boot.boot_selector: --boot_size $boot.boot_size --final_set_method $boot.final_set_method.final_set_method_selector #if $boot.final_set_method.final_set_method_selector == 'frequency': --freq_cutoff $boot.final_set_method.freq_cutoff #end if #end if
## tune the final feature selection by p-values --pval_tune $pval_tune.pval_tune_selector #if $pval_tune.pval_tune_selector: --pval_thre $pval_tune.pval_thre #end if
## output files --stats $stats --box $box --pca $pca --pls $pls --rda $rda --fusion_file $fusion_file --data_fs_file $data_fs_file #if $stats: --stats_file $stats_file #end if #if $box: --box_file $box_file #end if #if $pca: --pca_file $pca_file #end if #if $pls: --pls_file $pls_file #end if #if $rda: --rda_file $rda_file #end if

param.name: data_file
param.label: Data matrix
param.help: Metabolomics data matrix which has rows of replicates and columns of features.

param.name: meta_file
param.label: Meta matrix
param.help: Meta information for the experiments. One of column will be used as group information for the feature selection.

param.name: group
param.label: Specify group information
param.help: One of columns in meta data should be selected as group for the feature selection

param.name: fs_method
param.label: Multiple feature selection method
param.help: Select one or more feature selection method
param.option: Feature selection using area under receiver operating curve (AUC)
Feature selection using Random Forests (RF) important scores
Feature selection using PLS regression coefficient
Feature selection using Support Vector Machine Recursive Feature Elimination (SVM-RFE)

param.name: top_k
param.label: Top-k features
param.help: Select Top-K features from each of method for the final feature subset selection

param.label: Feature selection with bootstrapping
param.name: boot_selector
param.help: Specipy whether or not apply bootstrapping resampling to feature selection.

param.name: boot_size
param.label: Bootstrp size
param.help: THe bootstrap size should be larger than 100.

param.name: final_set_method_selector
param.label: Choose a method for the final feature selection subset.

param.name: freq_cutoff
param.label: Frequency cutoff for the final subset.

param.name: pval_tune_selector
param.label: Final tune feature selection by p-values
param.help: Filter the final feature set by the threshold of p-values.

param.name: pval_thre
param.label: Specify p-value threshold
param.help: This value should be less than 0.005.

param.name: stats
param.label: Save statistical summary of data set after feature selection

param.name: box
param.label: Plot boxplots of data set after feature selection
param.help: Output boxplots of data set after feature selection

param.name: pca
param.label: Plot PCA data set after feature selection
param.help: Output PCA plot of data set after feature selection

param.name: pls
param.label: Plot PLS data set after feature selection
param.help: Output PLS plot of data set after feature selection

param.name: rda
param.label: Output R results
param.help: R results including stats summary and data set after feature selection

data.name: data_fs_file
data.label: Data metrix afer feature selection on ${on_string}

data.name: pca_file
data.label: PCA plot after feature selection on ${on_string}

data.name: pls_file
data.label: PLS-DA plot after feature selection on ${on_string}

tool.help: This is a basic Galaxy wrapper for pre-processing.
